column3: na ɔsee dɛ: Hom mboa hom ano

column3: ennkɛkyɛn; Osiandɛ efoow w’egya ne mpa: Nna iguu ho fi: efoow m’adae."

column2: "Simeon nye Levi wɔyɛ enuanom; Hɔn mfona yɛ enyiber akodze."

column3: mma mmba hɔn apam mu; M’enyimnyam

column5: Na hɔn ahopɔw mu na wotwitwaa nantwi anantsir."

column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ hyew; Na hɔn enyiber
column4: osiandɛ no mu yɛ dzen: Mebɛpaapaa hɔn mu wɔ Jakob mu
column5: Na mabɔ hɔn apetse wɔ Israel mu."

column3: ɔwo na wo nuanom beyi wo ayɛw: Wo nsa bɛhyɛ w’atamfo hɔn kɔn do; W’egya mba bɔbɔ hɔn mu adze wɔ w’enyim."

column2: "Juda yɛ ogyata ba; Abɔgyanam ara na edze enyin
column3: me ba: ɔkotowee

column3: Nna mbrahyɛfo poma nnkefi n’anan ntamu
column4: Kɛpem dɛ Siloh bɛba; Na ɔno na aman bɛyɛ setsie ama no."

column3: Na n’asoasopɔnkɔber ba wɔ wenyindua pa ho; ɔahor ne ntar wɔ wenyin mu
column4: Na n’akataho wɔ wenyinamba bɔgya mu:"

column3: Na numfonsu ama ne se ho ahoa fitaa."

column2: "Zebulun bɛtsena po berekyir: Na ɔbɛyɛ mbrɛ ahɛn gyinagyina; Na ɔnye Zidon bɔbɔ ɔhe."
"Isakar yɛ asoaso a no ho yɛ dzen
column3: Obutuuw nguamban ntamu:"
Na asaase no dɛ ɔyɛ fɛw; Na ɔbrɛɛ n’abatsir adze dze soae
column4: Na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔsomfo wɔ edwumadzen mu."

column3: Dɛ Israel mbusuakuw mu kor."

column3: Ehurutsia a ɔda akwantsen

dɔm bɛhyɛ no do: Na ɔno so bɛhyɛ hɔn etsia hɔn anantsir."

column2: "Mekyerɛ w’egya ne Nyankopɔn a ɔbɔboa wo no
column3: Na Otumfo a ɔdze ɔsor nhyira
column4: Bun a ɔda daadzetsirmu ne nhyira
column9: "W’egya ne nhyira Akyɛn daa mbepɔw ne nhyira ɔdze kodu tsetse mbepɔw no n’ano no ho ara: ɔbɛtsena Josef n’etsifi
column10: Nyia wɔtseew no fii no nuanom ho no n’etsifi pampamu."

column2: "Benjamin yɛ pataku a ɔtsetsew mbowa mu: Obedzi abɔgyanam anapa
column3: Na ewimbir no ɔakyɛ asadze."

column2: "Woyinom nyinara nye Israel mbusuakuw duebien no: na iyi na hɔn egya kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn na ɔdze hyiraa hɔn no; hɔn nyinara mbrɛ hɔn nhyira tsetsee nkorkor
column3: na ohyiraa hɔn."
na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze me kɛka mo nkorɔfo ho: wonsie me m’egyanom nkyɛn wɔ ɔbo tu a ɔwɔ Efron Hetnyi no
column7: "wɔ ɔbo tu a ɔwɔ Makepela haban mu no a
column9: wɔ Keenan asaase do no a Abraham dze kaa haban no ho tɔɔ no wɔ Hetnyi Efron hɔ
column10: dze yɛɛ efunsiebea no no mu:"

column2: "hɔ na wosiee Abraham nye ne yer Sara; hɔ na wosiee Isaak nye ne yer Rebeka; na hɔ na misiee Leah:"
"haban no nye ɔbo tu a ɔwɔ mu no a wɔtɔɔ no wɔ Hetmba hɔ no a."
